title: Sirloin steak with peppercorn sauce, mash and hazelnut beans
description: Classic steaks with peppercorn sauce, provide a delicious bistro supper, served with mash to mop up the sauce.
ingredients: 4 x 200g/7oz sirloin steaks, flattened slightly using a meat hammer or rolling pin
salt and freshly ground black pepper
2 tbsp whole black peppercorns, lightly crushed
1 kg/2lb 4oz floury potatoes, peeled and cut into chunks
